      • main

      • createTeams

        private static void createTeams(java.util.List<Agent> blueTeam,
                                java.util.List<Agent> redTeam,
                                int choice,
                                int bonus)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Function used to create the two teams of agent for the simulations
        Parameters:
        blueTeam - the Blue team (that engages first and gets the bonus if there's one)
        redTeam - the Red team
        choice - the user simulation mode choice
        bonus - value of the bonus
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any errors in creation occurs

      • startup

        private static int startup()
        Startup of the app, shows the different simulations available and ask the user to choose the one he wants
        Returns:
        int : The user choice

      • fillBonus

        private static int fillBonus(int choice)
        Ask the user to fill the bonus or penalty wanted for the blue team if he chose the the Advantage mode)
        Parameters:
        choice - int : The user choice
        Returns:
        int : The bonus or penalty
